data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Hongwei, Song, Weibo, Warren, Alan, Roberts, David, Gong, Jun, Al-Rasheid, Khaled A. S. (2006): Redescription of the marine scuticociliate Glauconema trihymene Thompson, 1966 (Protozoa: Ciliophora): life cycle and stomatogenesis. Zootaxa 1296: 1-17, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173550
